labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Steam Overlay immediately begins taking screenshots as rapidly as possible, stopping only when Steam Overlay is opened or game is closed
data.short_description: Discord Overlay causes Steam Overlay to take constant screenshots without input until Steam Overlay is opened
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Monster Hunter: World with both Steam Overlay and Discord Overlay active - Set Steam Overlay screenshot Shortcut to "None" - Test that no single key takes a screenshot - Press Ctrl + Tab to open Discord Overlay
